text: Huwa Al-Ladhi Yusayyirukum Fi Al-Barri Wa Al-Bahri Hatta 'Idha Kuntum Fi Al-Fulki Wa Jarayna Bihim Birihin Tayyibatin Wa Farihu Biha Ja'at/ha Rihun `Asifun Wa Ja'ahumu Al-Mawju Min Kulli Makanin Wa Zannu 'Annahum 'Uhita Bihim Da`aw Allaha Mukhlisina Lahu Ad-Dina La'in 'Anjaytana Min Hadhihi Lanakunanna Mina Ash-Shakirina
